product_name: Ahnu Sugarpine Waterproof Hiking Shoes - Women's
long_description: Incredibly lightweight, extraordinarily supportive and fully waterproof, the women's Ahnu Sugarpine hiking shoes will take you on fast-moving hikes in colorful style. Waterproof leather and synthetic textile uppers are flexible and tough, supplying lasting performance on the trail; rubber toe caps protect uppers and feet from abrasion. Waterproof, breathable membranes protect feet from the elements while retaining excellent breathability; nylon linings wick moisture away from feet. Dual-density EVA midsoles supply lightweight, cushioned support underfoot. Nylon and fiberglass arch shanks combine with EVA shock plates for stability and support. Vibram(R) rubber outsoles on the Ahnu Sugarpine waterproof hiking shoes ensure lasting, dependable traction on trails.
short_description: Incredibly lightweight, extraordinarily supportive and fully waterproof, the women's Ahnu Sugarpine hiking shoes will take you on fast-moving hikes in colorful style.
